description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fet04","text":"This protocol details the spike sorting procedures used on the collected electrode recording data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: "Reward perseveration is shaped by GABAA-mediated dopamine pauses", Burwell et al

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fenhq","text":"For more information on setting up and using Spyking Circus, see: https://spyking-circus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/code/index.html .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":63}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"88D0C9A3F0AC11EEA5500A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://spyking-circus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/code/index.html"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fa3d","text":"Make a copy of the continuous.dat data file from your recording into a new “sorted_data” folder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sajm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cghb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cobv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":15,"style":"bold"},{"length":4,"offset":37,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8sa01","text":"Important note: Make sure to place a copy the continuous.dat file in this folder, and not the original, as the file will change as a result of spike sorting and you want to preserve the original raw data. This means you will also need to make a new copy the raw continuous.dat file if you need to redo the spike sorting analysis for any reason.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hh9i","text":"Add a .params file with the same name as the .dat file to the folder (i.e., continuous.params). The continuous.params used for these experiments:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74bd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e9qd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"482ks","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a253t","text":"[data]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9d685","text":"file_format    = raw_binary","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2om8a","text":"data_offset    = 0                    ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ed7r","text":"mapping        = path\\open_ephys_16prb.prb     # Mapping of the electrode ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1eq1c","text":"\t\t\t\t\t\t\t                   #see prb file below","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eccjh","text":"suffix         =           # Suffix to add to generated files","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1og0d","text":"data_dtype     = int16     # Type of the data","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b7qs4","text":"dtype_offset   = auto      # Padding for data (if auto: int16 is 0)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7o5nf","text":"skip_artefact  = False     # Skip part of signals with large fluctuations","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c0qeg","text":"sampling_rate  = 30000     # Sampling rate of the data [Hz]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7f6gr","text":"stationary     = True      # Should be False for long recordings","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d8fhe","text":"radius         = auto      # Radius [in um] (if auto, read from the prb file)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"boki8","text":"alignment      = True      # Realign the waveforms by oversampling","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a713h","text":"global_tmp     = True          ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b90td","text":"multi-files    = False     # If several files mydata_0,1,..,n.dat should be processed together","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"acio1","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1spmm","text":"[detection]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8i7je","text":"spike_thresh   = 4","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1en6h","text":"N_t            = 2 or 3    # Width of the templates [in ms]. We used both 2 and 3 in different sortings to extract all the templates included.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8nj7s","text":"peaks          = positive  # can be positive, negative, or both","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8gmi2","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2s1t0","text":"[filtering]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9j3pe","text":"cut_off        = 250       # Cut off freq for the butterworth filter [Hz]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2t901","text":"filter         = True      # If True, then a low-pass filtering is performed ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5si0b","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5adto","text":"[whitening]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"u4fo","text":"chunk_size     = 60        # Size of the data chunks [in s]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7h042","text":"safety_time    = 1         # Temporal zone around which templates are ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6l3om","text":"isolated [in ms]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dhngv","text":"temporal       = False     # Perform temporal whitening ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9hj7a","text":"spatial        = True      # Perform spatial whitening","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e6l0b","text":"max_elts       = 10000     # Max number of events per electrode","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7mui0","text":"nb_elts        = 0.8       # Fraction of max_elts that should be obtained per electrode [0-1]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ck34u","text":"output_dim     = 5         # Can be in percent of variance explain, or num of dimensions for PCA on waveforms","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"466cr","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"99ca0","text":"[clustering]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ndof","text":"extraction     = median-raw # Can be either median-raw (default), median-pca, mean-pca, mean-raw, or quadratic","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"qaov","text":"safety_space   = True      # If True, we exclude spikes in the vicinity of a selected spikes","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"612d4","text":"safety_time    = auto      # Temporal zone around which templates are isolated [in ms]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8te8p","text":"max_elts       = 15000     # Max number of events per electrode (should be compatible with nb_elts)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aqj66","text":"nb_elts        = 0.8       # Fraction of max_elts that should be obtained per electrode [0-1]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8i1a","text":"nclus_min      = 0.0075    # Min number of elements in a cluster (given in percentage)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4bfe7","text":"max_clusters   = 20        # Maximal number of clusters for every electrodes","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"98ojh","text":"nb_repeats     = 3         # Number of passes used for the clustering","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"21u5t","text":"smart_search   = 0         # Parameter for the smart search [0-1]. The higher, the more strict","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2g0qt","text":"sim_same_elec  = 0.75      # Distance within clusters under which they are re-merged","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2md6c","text":"cc_merge       = 1         # If CC between two templates is higher, they are merged","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"al48h","text":"noise_thr      = 0.8       # Minimal amplitudes are such than ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5s2td","text":"amp*min(templates) \u003c noise_thr*threshold ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5r39f","text":"make_plots     = png       # Generate sanity plots of the clustering ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9nf9h","text":"remove_mixture = True      # At the end of the clustering, we remove mixtures ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1p9cn","text":"of templates","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cnoec","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7hmb5","text":"[fitting]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6s8rh","text":"chunk          = 1         # Size of chunks used during fitting [in second]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b64u5","text":"gpu_only       = False     # Use GPU for computation of b's AND fitting","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9jst8","text":"amp_limits     = (0.3, 5)  # Amplitudes for the templates during spike ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6h1c0","text":"detection","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"951rt","text":"amp_auto       = True      # True if amplitudes are adjusted automatically ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"amhht","text":"for every templates","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"92ggv","text":"refractory     = 0         # Refractory period, in ms [0 is None]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8k4kb","text":"max_chunk      = inf       # Fit only up to max_chunk   ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eod8h","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6pm6u","text":"[merging]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8296e","text":"cc_overlap     = 0.5       # Only templates with CC higher than cc_overlap ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ggnr","text":"may be merged","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"imhb","text":"cc_bin         = 2         # Bin size for computing CC [in ms]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8k0g3","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"88d46","text":"[extracting]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4i6p6","text":"safety_time    = 3         # Temporal zone around which spikes are isolated ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"etnt8","text":"[in ms]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a1ip6","text":"max_elts       = 1000      # Max number of collected events per templates","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4cji2","text":"output_dim     = 5         # Percentage of variance explained while ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ebfas","text":"performing PCA","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"52mhh","text":"cc_merge       = 1         # If CC between two templates is higher, they are ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4irv5","text":"merged","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b8eod","text":"noise_thr      = 0.8       # Minimal amplitudes are such than","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2mgdp","text":"amp*min(templates) \u003c noise_thr*threshold","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b8tr6","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1s1qt","text":"[noedits]","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1negf","text":"filter_done    = False     # Automatically edited – make sure this is False ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bkgmj","text":"before running the sorter","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mtub","text":"The .params file needs to have correct path to a .prb file (the mapping of the electrode you are using). We recorded with bundles of 16 individual electrodes, and used the following .prb {"blocks":[{"key":"c6cp0","text":"Launch the Spyking Circus GUI from the anaconda terminal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1t6m7","text":"Run the sorting in the Main Algorithm tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bnpk","text":"When the next window pops up, click “Suggest pairs”, “Select pairs”, then “Merge and finalize”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2d70q","text":"Browse → select continuous.dat file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dpr3s","text":"Increase CPUs as desired, then click “Run”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekr6j","text":"To view results: View Results tab → Browse → select the analyzed continuous.dat file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aohrl","text":"Options:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3d156","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26i01","text":"Matlab GUI","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc4km","text":"Extension = “merged”","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ba68","text":"Click “Run”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"619hb","text":"See https://spyking-circus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/GUI/sorting.html for detailed documentation on what each panel of the GUI does.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":64}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A4FF14CAF0B311EEA5500A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://spyking-circus.readthedocs.io/en/latest/GUI/sorting.html"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5k14l","text":"Sorting:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63c7m","text":"Set bin size to 1, click “Big ISI”, and update the scale so you can see whole waveforms (zooming out usually works).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4avgi","text":"Go through all templates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arpbr","text":"First pass: Kill a cell if it has above a 1% incidence of refractory period violations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1okif","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df2kv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"digit","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bj2be","text":"RPV: % of spike pairs where your assumption about the refractory period are violated.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8du4a","text":"Second pass: merge templates that you think are the same cell, using the two template view.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"930oa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esimo","text":"Criteria used: similar waveforms, cross correlation dropping to zero at zero, coefficient of similarity close to 1.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcpra","text":"Sometimes you have to merge more than two templates for one cell.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ftm1","text":"Merge template with fewer spikes into the one with more spikes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnqg5","text":"Third pass: kill units that don’t meet requirements (too sparse, not spiking consistently across the whole session, auto correlation doesn’t go to zero, RPV has gone above 1%).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bm6to","text":"Add suffix (ex, ‘v1’ for first attempt at sorting) and save.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: In vivo Ephys: Spike Sorting Protocol
